ai-tha-ap17:1.2_0: or like an person who has reached the best.
ai-tha-ap17:1.4_0: Getting the Shrine of a Shrine,
ai-tha-ap17:2.1_0: Those who have ended the defilements
ai-tha-ap17:4.4_0: My nymphs used to be delighted.
ai-tha-ap17:6.1_0: In the fifth year of the five twenty-five years,
ai-tha-ap17:6.3_0: I was purified my bright meal.
ai-tha-ap17:7.1_0: They do not sow the seed,
ai-tha-ap17:7.2_0: nor do they draw the plough.
ai-tha-ap17:8.2_0: Go back to the realm of the gods.
ai-tha-ap17:8.3_0: Then at that time I was like the sweat-pin,
ai-tha-ap17:9.3_0: I all love them and be free of them.
ai-tha-ap17:10.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap17:12.1_0: I am the one who has lost my virtue.
ai-tha-ap17:12.3_0: Having driven out the good rebirth,
ai-tha-ap17:12.4_0: I was loved by the gods.
ai-tha-ap17:13.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap17:14.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pilindavaccha.
ai-tha-ap17:15.1_0: The fifth Elder Pilindavaccha was the fifth section.
